content.raw:
So change the title of the Colcon section to “Building the Ignition Libraries” and making this section a part of the “Install dependencies” sections for each platform?  
Were you thinking that the heading just be removed so it blends into the “Install dependencies” section or making this heading level 4 so it’s under “Install dependencies”, and changing the name to something like “Compiler requirements”?
